nodes.text: Soris was a male Nikto bounty hunter who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Circa 1 ABY, Soris was recruited by Borvo the Hutt in order to eliminate the Gungan politician Nalskel on Naboo. Nevertheless, Nalskel seek help and contacted the famous bounty hunter Boba Fett. Fett thus sent a novice bounty hunter to resolve the politician's problem. The bounty hunter visited Soris' camp outside of the city of Kaadara and found a datapad which contained information regarding Soris' allegiance with Borvo's criminal empire. The bounty hunter therefore attacked one of Borvo's camp near Kaadara and eliminated several criminals. The bounty hunter finally entered the camp and met Soris himself. After the bounty hunter gave him his death mark from Nalskel, Soris attempted to defend himself but he was killed by the bounty hunter.
